Sentencas: In this paper, perovskite oxide La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-delta (LSCM) mixed with a small fraction Ni has been used as the anode of single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell(s) operating in a methane-oxygen mixture.
Titulo: Performance of the Single-Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cell with a La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ-Based Perovskite Anode

Sentencas: The anode is prepared by an ion impregnation method, whereby a proper mixed solution with metal nitrates and urea is incorporated into the porous presintered yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) anode matrix.
Titulo: Performance of the Single-Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cell with a La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ-Based Perovskite Anode

Sentencas: After sintering at 1100 degrees C, the impregnated materials change to unique microparticles adhered to the YSZ matrix.
Titulo: Performance of the Single-Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cell with a La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ-Based Perovskite Anode

Sentencas: These microparticles themselves become porous after reducing in single-chamber conditions, and this porous character is expected to facilitate the anode reaction because it would improve the gas transport.
Titulo: Performance of the Single-Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cell with a La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ-Based Perovskite Anode

Sentencas: The influence of the environmental temperature and gas composition on the cell performance is also investigated.
Titulo: Performance of the Single-Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cell with a La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ-Based Perovskite Anode

Sentencas: A maximum power density of 285 mW/cm(2) is achieved at a gas composition of CH4:O-2 approximate to 2:1 and a furnace temperature of 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Performance of the Single-Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cell with a La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ-Based Perovskite Anode

Sentencas: The redox cycling test demonstrates that the stability of the LSCM-based anode is better compared to the conventional Ni-YSZ anode.
Titulo: Performance of the Single-Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cell with a La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ-Based Perovskite Anode
